AcceptInboundCrossClusterSearchConnectio.name: AcceptInboundCrossClusterSearchConnection
AcceptInboundCrossClusterSearchConnectio.description:
Allows the destination domain owner to accept an inbound cross-cluster search connection
                                                request

AddTags.name: AddTags
AddTags.description: Grants permission to attach resource tags to an Amazon ES domain.

CreateElasticsearchDomain.name: CreateElasticsearchDomain
CreateElasticsearchDomain.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon ES domain.

CreateElasticsearchServiceRole.name: CreateElasticsearchServiceRole
CreateElasticsearchServiceRole.description:
Grants permission to create the service-linked role required for Amazon ES domains
                                                that use VPC access.

CreateOutboundCrossClusterSearchConnecti.name: CreateOutboundCrossClusterSearchConnection
CreateOutboundCrossClusterSearchConnecti.description:
Creates a new cross-cluster search connection from a source domain to a destination
                                                domain

DeleteElasticsearchDomain.name: DeleteElasticsearchDomain
DeleteElasticsearchDomain.description: Grants permission to delete an Amazon ES domain and all of its data.

DeleteElasticsearchServiceRole.name: DeleteElasticsearchServiceRole
DeleteElasticsearchServiceRole.description:
Grants permission to delete the service-linked role required for Amazon ES domains
                                                that use VPC access.

DeleteInboundCrossClusterSearchConnectio.name: DeleteInboundCrossClusterSearchConnection
DeleteInboundCrossClusterSearchConnectio.description:
Allows the destination domain owner to delete an existing inbound cross-cluster search
                                                connection

DeleteOutboundCrossClusterSearchConnecti.name: DeleteOutboundCrossClusterSearchConnection
DeleteOutboundCrossClusterSearchConnecti.description:
Allows the source domain owner to delete an existing outbound cross-cluster search
                                                connection

DescribeElasticsearchDomain.name: DescribeElasticsearchDomain
DescribeElasticsearchDomain.description:
Grants permission to view a description of the domain configuration for the specified
                                                Amazon ES domain, including the domain ID, domain service endpoint, and domain ARN.

DescribeElasticsearchDomainConfig.name: DescribeElasticsearchDomainConfig
DescribeElasticsearchDomainConfig.description:
Grants permission to view a description of the configuration options and status of
                                                an Amazon ES domain.

DescribeElasticsearchDomains.name: DescribeElasticsearchDomains
DescribeElasticsearchDomains.description:
Grants permission to view a description of the domain configuration for up to five
                                                specified Amazon ES domains.

DescribeElasticsearchInstanceTypeLimits.name: DescribeElasticsearchInstanceTypeLimits
DescribeElasticsearchInstanceTypeLimits.description:
Grants permission to view the instance count, storage, and master node limits for
                                                a given Elasticsearch version and instance type.

DescribeInboundCrossClusterSearchConnect.name: DescribeInboundCrossClusterSearchConnections
DescribeInboundCrossClusterSearchConnect.description: Lists all the inbound cross-cluster search connections for a destination domain

DescribeOutboundCrossClusterSearchConnec.name: DescribeOutboundCrossClusterSearchConnections
DescribeOutboundCrossClusterSearchConnec.description: Lists all the outbound cross-cluster search connections for a source domain

DescribeReservedElasticsearchInstanceOff.name: DescribeReservedElasticsearchInstanceOfferings
DescribeReservedElasticsearchInstanceOff.description: Grants permission to fetch reserved instance offerings for ES

DescribeReservedElasticsearchInstances.name: DescribeReservedElasticsearchInstances
DescribeReservedElasticsearchInstances.description: Grants permission to fetch ES reserved instances already purchased by customer

ESCrossClusterGet.name: ESCrossClusterGet
ESCrossClusterGet.description: Grants permission to send cross-cluster requests to a destination domain.

ESHttpDelete.name: ESHttpDelete
ESHttpDelete.description: Grants permission to send HTTP DELETE requests to the Elasticsearch APIs.

ESHttpGet.name: ESHttpGet
ESHttpGet.description: Grants permission to send HTTP GET requests to the Elasticsearch APIs.

ESHttpHead.name: ESHttpHead
ESHttpHead.description: Grants permission to send HTTP HEAD requests to the Elasticsearch APIs.

ESHttpPatch.name: ESHttpPatch
ESHttpPatch.description: Grants permission to send HTTP PATCH requests to the Elasticsearch APIs.

ESHttpPost.name: ESHttpPost
ESHttpPost.description: Grants permission to send HTTP POST requests to the Elasticsearch APIs.

ESHttpPut.name: ESHttpPut
ESHttpPut.description: Grants permission to send HTTP PUT requests to the Elasticsearch APIs.

GetCompatibleElasticsearchVersions.name: GetCompatibleElasticsearchVersions
GetCompatibleElasticsearchVersions.description:
Grants permission to fetch list of compatible elastic search versions to which Amazon
                                                ES domain can be upgraded

GetUpgradeHistory.name: GetUpgradeHistory
GetUpgradeHistory.description: Grants permission to fetch upgrade history for given ES domain

GetUpgradeStatus.name: GetUpgradeStatus
GetUpgradeStatus.description: Grants permission to fetch upgrade status for given ES domain

ListDomainNames.name: ListDomainNames
ListDomainNames.description:
Grants permission to display the names of all Amazon ES domains that the current user
                                                owns.

ListElasticsearchInstanceTypeDetails.name: ListElasticsearchInstanceTypeDetails
ListElasticsearchInstanceTypeDetails.description:
Grants permission to list all instance types and available features for a given Elasticsearch
                                                version.

ListElasticsearchInstanceTypes.name: ListElasticsearchInstanceTypes
ListElasticsearchInstanceTypes.description:
Grants permission to list all Elasticsearch instance types that are supported for
                                                a given Elasticsearch version.

ListElasticsearchVersions.name: ListElasticsearchVersions
ListElasticsearchVersions.description: Grants permission to list all supported Elasticsearch versions on Amazon ES.

ListTags.name: ListTags
ListTags.description: Grants permission to display all of the tags for an Amazon ES domain.

PurchaseReservedElasticsearchInstanceOff.name: PurchaseReservedElasticsearchInstanceOffering
PurchaseReservedElasticsearchInstanceOff.description: Grants permission to purchase ES reserved instances

RejectInboundCrossClusterSearchConnectio.name: RejectInboundCrossClusterSearchConnection
RejectInboundCrossClusterSearchConnectio.description:
Allows the destination domain owner to reject an inbound cross-cluster search connection
                                                request

RemoveTags.name: RemoveTags
RemoveTags.description: Grants permission to remove tags from Amazon ES domains.

UpdateElasticsearchDomainConfig.name: UpdateElasticsearchDomainConfig
UpdateElasticsearchDomainConfig.description:
Grants permission to modify the configuration of an Amazon ES domain, such as the
                                                instance type or number of instances.

UpgradeElasticsearchDomain.name: UpgradeElasticsearchDomain
UpgradeElasticsearchDomain.description: Grants permission to initiate upgrade of elastic search domain to given version
